/ENTRY.docstring: Entry point of the NeXus format

/definition.docstring: NeXus schema used for this file

/title.docstring: Title of this file, should be something meaningfull

/DATA.docstring: Group containing the data for I and R

@signal.docstring: name of the default data field (in this case, always I)

@I_axes.docstring:
Will specify which dimension corresponds to each parameters
String with this format : "parameter1, parameter2, ..., parameterN"

@Q_indices.docstring:
Will specify the index (0_based) of the parameter in @I_axesused to plot the I data.
String with this format : "index1, index2"

@mask_indices.docstring:
Will specify the index (0_based) of the parameter in @I_axes used to apply the mask.
String with this format : "index1, index2"

/R.docstring: Array of R (positions), can be an array of 3D vector or an array of scalar representing |R|

@units.docstring: Unit of R (will be converted to nm).

@uncertainties.docstring: Name of the R uncertainties dataset

@resolutions.docstring:
Names(s) of the resolutions dataset.
String with this format : "name1, name2"

@units.docstring: Unit of Rdev (will be converted to nm)
Unit of dRl (will be converted to nm)
Unit of dRw (will be converted to nm)

/Rmean.docstring: Mean value of R at that point, usefull when binning

@units.docstring: Unit of Rmean (will be converted to nm)
Unit of I.

@uncertainties.docstring: Name of the I uncertainties dataset

@scaling_factor.docstring: Name of the scaling factor dataset

@units.docstring: Unit of Idev.

/INSTRUMENT.docstring: Group containing relevant information concerning the instrument

/APERTURE.docstring: Group containing relevant information concerning the aperture of instrument

@units.docstring: Unit of the x_gap
Unit of the y_gap

/COLLIMATOR.docstring: Group containing relevant information concerning the collimator of instrument

@units.docstring: Unit of the collimation length
Unit of the collimator-sample distance

/DETECTOR.docstring: Group containing relevant information concerning the detector of the instrument

@units.docstring: Unit of the sample-detector distance
Unit of the detector's slit (will be converted to nm)
Unit of the detector's x position
Unit of the detector's y position

/roll.docstring: Rotation of the detector on the axis of the source

@units.docstring: Unit of the rotation (will be converted to rad)

/pitch.docstring: Rotation of the detector on the horizontal axis

@units.docstring: Unit of the rotation (will be converted to rad)

/yaw.docstring: Rotation of the detector on the vertical axis

@units.docstring: Unit of the rotation (will be converted to rad)

/beam_center_x.docstring: Horizontal position of the beam center (where it would hit without the sample)

@units.docstring: Unit of the detector's y position

/beam_center_y.docstring: Vertical position of the beam center (where it would hit without the sample)

@units.docstring: Unit of the detector's y position

/x_pixel_size.docstring: Horizontal size of the detector's pixel

@units.docstring: Unit of the pixel's horizontal size

/y_pixel_size.docstring: Vertical size of the detector's pixel

@units.docstring: Unit of the pixel's vertical size

/SOURCE.docstring: Group containing relevant information concerning the source used.

@units.docstring: Unit of the incident wavelength (will be converted to nm)

/wavelength_min.docstring: Minimum wavelength if a range is specified

@units.docstring: Unit of the incident wavelength (will be converted to nm)

/wavelength_max.docstring: Maximum wavelength if a range is specified

@units.docstring: Unit of the incident wavelength (will be converted to nm)

/wavelength_spread.docstring: The FWHM of the wavelength range

@units.docstring: Unit of the incident wavelength (will be converted to nm)
Unit of the horizontal beam size
Unit of the vertical beam size

/SAMPLE.docstring: Group containing information concerning the Sample used

@units.docstring: Unit of the thickness
Unit of the temperature
Unit of the detector's x position
Unit of the detector's y position

/roll.docstring: Rotation of the sample on the axis of the source

@units.docstring: Unit of the rotation (will be converted to rad)

/pitch.docstring: Rotation of the sample on the horizontal axis

@units.docstring: Unit of the rotation (will be converted to rad)

/yaw.docstring: Rotation of the sample on the vertical axis

@units.docstring: Unit of the rotation (will be converted to rad)
